resources.string: On the homepage you will see 10 top articles when the application boots. Which news this will be, depends on how your preferences are set. More info about this in the preferences part.

Each article will show the title, the name of the source and the date and time when the article was posted. Each artcle has some actions connected to it. It\'s possible to go to the website of the source by clicking on its name. By clicking on the globe icon you\'ll be navigated to the online page to read the article. By clicking the heart, the app saves this article. The share icon makes it possible to share this article by Facebook, Whatsapp, ... .

On the search page, the user can look for articles by entering a keyword or selecting a category. The categories are the following: World, Nation, Business, Technology, Entertainment, Sports, Science, Health.

On the favorites page, the user can see all the saved articles, which are saved on the homepage or the search page. The articles look the same, also have the same functionality (as homepage). There is one difference and that\'s the save icon which is begin replaced by a delete icon, to delete this article from the favorites.

The settingspage is accessible by the icon in the top-right corner of the toolbar. On this page you can set your language and country. There is a choice between: Belgium-Dutch, Belgium-French, The Netherlands-dutch, France-French, Germany-German, UK-English, US-English.
These are the authors of Newsy:
